name: stock_net_share_purchase_activity
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool yahoo_finance_v2.
Tool description: Yahoo Finance API for stocks, options, ETFs, mutual funds and news. Moved to: https://rapidapi.com/sparior/api/mboum-finance
API description: Fetches net share purchase activity information for a particular stock symbol.

symbol.description: The stock symbol for which to retrieve net share purchase activity information.
